suncertify.server
Class RemoteDatabaseImpl

java.lang.Object
  java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
          java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
              suncertify.server.RemoteDatabaseImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote, DBClient, RemoteDatabase
public class RemoteDatabaseImpl
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements RemoteDatabase

Implements all the methods of the remote object. That is all the methods calleable by the GUI - client when running in networked mode; same as the ones in DBClient

Called when a client books a record.

Specified by:
bookHotelRoom in interface DBClient
Parameters:
owner - the ownerID of the client booking the record (hotel room)
room - the hotel room to be booked
Returns:
true if booking was successful, false if otherwise
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - if registry could not contacted.
RecordNotFoundException - if hotel room cannot be found using its associated record number in the database file.
java.lang.SecurityException - if the client is not the one who locked the room
java.io.IOException - declared in order to be able to throw a RemoteException when running in networked mode).

checkRoomAvailability

public boolean checkRoomAvailability(HotelRoom room)
                              throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                     java.io.IOException
Checks the availability of a hotel room to be booked. This check is based on the ownerId of the hotel room and on 48 hours of the start of this room's occupancy ( 48 hour booking rule). With 48 hour rule, it is assumed that all the record's time of start of room occupancy is 00:00:00 BST. Hence any second or minute past this time makes a difference. It is also assumed that the client is booking a room at this current System date and time, hence the current date and time is used for the booking.

Specified by:
checkRoomAvailability in interface DBClient
Parameters:
room - the room to be booked
Returns:
true if the room is not already booked with an ownerId and the booking time is within 48 hours of the start of the room occupancy, false if otherwise.
Throws:
java.rmi.RemoteException - if registry could not be contacted
java.io.IOException - declared in order to be able to throw a RemoteException when running in networked mode.

getAllRooms

public java.lang.Object[][] getAllRooms()
                                 throws java.io.IOException
Returns all the hotel room objects loaded into the cache (HashMap)

Specified by:
getAllRooms in interface DBClient
Returns:
Object[][] array which contains the hotel room records' fields values
Throws:
java.io.IOException - The IOException is declared in order to be able to throw a RemoteException when running in networked mode.
